All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BuildPizzaController
Controller class for the "Build Pizza" view in the Pizza Pizza application.
BuildYourOwn
The BuildYourOwn class represents a customizable pizza where customers can build their own pizza by selecting toppings and adjusting the size.
Constants
The Constants class holds constants that are used in all classes for ease.
CurrentOrderController
The CurrentOrderController class is the controller for the current order view in the main application.
DataModel
The DataModel class represents a singleton data model for managing pizza orders and stored orders.
Deluxe
The Deluxe class represents a pizza with a combination of various toppings.
Meatzza
The Meatzza class represents a specific type of Pizza called Meatzza, which extends the Pizza class.
Order
The Order class represents a pizza order containing a unique order number and a list of pizzas to be included in the order.
PapasPizzeriaController
Controller class for the main functionality of Papa's Pizzeria application.
PapasPizzeriaMain
The main class for Papa's Pizzeria application, extending JavaFX Application.
Pepperoni
The Pepperoni class represents a pizza with pepperoni as its topping.
Pizza
The abstract base class for Pizza in the PizzaPizza application.
PizzaMaker
The `PizzaMaker` class provides a simple factory method to create various types of pizzas.
Sauce
The Sauce enum represents different types of pizza sauces.
Seafood
The Seafood class represents a pizza with seafood toppings, extending the Pizza class.
Size
The Size enum representing different sizes for a pizza.
SpecialtyController
The `SpecialtyController` class is a controller for the specialty pizza selection in the Pizza Pizza application.
StoredOrders
The `StoredOrders` class manages the storage and retrieval of pizza orders.
StoreOrdersController
Controller class for managing store orders in the Pizza Pizza application.
Supreme
The Supreme class represents a pizza of the "Supreme" variety, which extends the Pizza class.
Topping
The Topping enum represents various pizza toppings that can be used in a pizza order.
